import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import styles from './Avatar.module.css' import Card from './Card' const Avatar = ({id, src, diameter, hover}) => { const [onHover, setOnHover] = useState(false) return (
setOnHover(true)} onMouseLeave={()=>setOnHover(false)} to={`/profile/${id}`} >
{hover && !onHover &&
hii
}
) } export default Avatar
